item.title: About
item.description: I’m currently studying towards a PhD in AI for Healthcare as part of the third cohort for the AI4Health CDT at Imperial College London. My main PhD project is looking at interpretable, multimodal learning for idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis, supervised by Joram M. Posma and Phil Molyneaux. Before this, I did a bachelor’s in maths and computer science at Imperial and a master’s in precision medicine at UCL. My CV is available here.
